channel.title: I cant
channel.description: I cant get compile.bat and runserver.bat to work......i dont know what i did wrong can someone please help me?

item.title: I cant
item.dc:creator: @propabad propabad
item.description:
@propabad wrote:

first download JDK 5.0 Update 10 at this link
http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
after u have installed it paste this into your compile
@echo off
COLOR 08
title YOURSERVERNAMEHERE Client
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_10\bin\javac.exe” -cp . *.java
“C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_10\bin\java.exe” server
pause

and paste this into your runServer.bat
@echo off
title Runserver
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./Class; server
pause

Read full topic
